title: GPS signal sometimes repeatedly lost
content:
Sometimes my GPS signal will keep getting lost.

My Location accuracy is apparently already optimized. All my Location settings, as well as Bluetooth and WiFi, are turned on.

I tried to find where my phone allows Maps to run in the background, but I couldn't find it, so I'm not sure if it's running in the background or not.

I tried clearing the cache, but I didn't have anything in it.

I really don't want to do a factory reset, but I'm not sure what other steps to take before that.
